title: What welcome bonus does the casino offer?
text: These are deposit bonuses for casino games, sports betting, or activating a promo code.

title: Do I need to go through verification?
text: In order to withdraw winnings, all players are required to go through the identification procedure.

title: Can I use cryptocurrency?
text: Yes. Crypto wallets are available for deposits and withdrawals.

title: What is the minimum deposit?
text: Depending on the payment system, the minimum deposit is from 10-20 GBP.
